name: Countryballs: Over The World
description: Countryballs: Over The World is an adventure game based on Countryballs jokes with a story mode and two endless modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: Any CPU made since 2000 Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 2000 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 2000 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
